creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: rectangular; right side has wide flat rest with inlaid wire characters; left side is narrower with inlaid characters; open central area with 7 slots for brushes
inscription: \"Daoguang dingwei qiu qi yue\", in silver wire, L side; \"It\'s a good thing to do calligraphy when you feel in a bad mood. Don\'t spoil the future by dwelling on the past\", in silver wire, R side
title: Brush Rest
